/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a tranquil scene from a street in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, immersed in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, casting dappled shadows on the sidewalk. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, illuminating the scene with a warm glow. On the right side of the street, there's a building with a blue roof, its color contrasting beautifully with the surrounding greenery. The image is captured from a low angle, adding depth and perspective to the scene. The overall composition of the image suggests a peaceful coexistence of nature and urban life in Beijing.
